thread.title: Baskets as High Art: Jonathan Kline in the Hudson Valley – Remodelista Web Story
thread.title_full: Baskets as High Art: Jonathan Kline in the Hudson Valley – Remodelista Web Story

author: Remodelista Team
title: Baskets as High Art: Jonathan Kline in the Hudson Valley – Remodelista Web Story
text:
Baskets as High Art: Jonathan Kline in the Hudson Valley - Remodelista
We've long admired Hudson Valley-based basket maker Jonathan Kline, wh
o learned his craft from a fourth-generation, New Hampshire basket maker.
Kline, of Blackash Baskets, harvests his own black ash trees in the New York State Finger Lakes region for the wood he uses to weave these simple but finely
crafted baskets.
The Large Square Round Basket (L) has an iron oxide and blue-black paint finish for $400 a
nd the Candle Basket is finished with iron oxide and red paint for $200.
Read more
